reference_summary:
Vaultz Locking Makeup Artist Case, Black White Stripe (VZ03755)
Vaultz
['At Vaultz, "If it\'s Important to You, Lock It Up." The Vaultz Makeup Artist Case allows you to lock your personal and private items up in style. This durable and chic box is ideal for carrying makeup and other cosmetics on the go. The reliable key lock provides security, and the sturdy construction features steel corners, aluminum reinforcement, and a convenient handle for easy carrying. This makeup case features a built-in 14 brush holder in lid, a removable, divided, upper tray for simple access to lower compartment and 5 adjustable dividers to customize the space. This is a makeup case that you are sure to love. Black White Stripe.']
{'Product Dimensions': '9.75 x 9.13 x 15.38 inches; 2.8 Pounds', 'Item model number': 'VZ03755', 'UPC': '826030037553', 'Manufacturer': 'Ideastream Consumer Products, LLC'}
Plenty of room and does not weigh alot empty.
plenty of room
Lashtoniic Eyelash & Eyebrow Growth Serum - Grows Longer, Fuller, Thicker Lashes & Brows in 30 Days - 100% Natural Lash Enhancer Conditioner Treatment, No Irritation
QBEXJ
{'Brand': 'QBEXJ', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Package Type': 'Box', 'Specialty': 'Natural', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '4.41 x 0.59 x 0.59 inches; 0.63 Ounces', 'UPC': '734010214415'}
It seems to work.  I have been using this for about 3 weeks and notice longer lashes and thicker eyebrows.  I use it twice a day.  UPDATE:  I am on my second tube and I hope they do not stop making this stuff.  I have tried other serums but they burned my eyes.  This ones does not burn unless I actually drop it into my eye.  It has improved the length and health of my lashes and I seem to have more lashes when I curl them.  I am happy with this product and do not feel the need to purchase anything more expensive or that might work faster.
Notice a difference after about 3 weeks.
Eyebrow Makeup Gel, Eyebrow Tint Gel, Eyebrow Dye Cream, 2Pcs Natural Color Eyebrow Gel, Waterproof Long Lasting Eyebrow Dye Gel for Eyebrow Makeup
CidBestOfficial
{'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '4.84 x 2.32 x 0.75 inches; 1.62 Ounces'}
Works really well on my greying brows.  Would rather purchase in singles, but this is not bad.  The dark is really dark.  Lots of pigment.  I would repurchase
